sources.title: The Kansan
sources.description: Wounded while stopping the James gang from robbing the local bank, a cowboy (Richard Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find that he's been elected town marshal. He soon comes into conflict with the town banker (Victor Jory), who controls everything in town and is squeezing the townspeople for every penny he can get out of them.

sources.title: The Kansan (1943) RICHARD DIX
sources.description:
Stars: Richard Dix, Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker 
 Director: George Archainbaud

 Wounded while stopping the James gang from robbing the local bank, a cowboy wakes up in the hospital to find that he's been elected town marshal. He soon comes into conflict with the town banker, who controls everything in town and is squeezing the townspeople for every penny he can get out of them.

He soon comes into conflict with the town banker, who controls everything in town and is squeezing the townspeople for every penny he can get out of them.
